name: Tripfag-Finder
body:
### What it is: Tripfag-Finder is an easy-to-use userscript for finding threads on /b/.
It works with Greasemonkey-compatible software, including Firefox, Google Chrome, and Opera. ### How to get it: Simply download and install `Tripfag-Finder.user.js`
On Chrome, this may require going to `chrome://extensions` and dragging the file onto that page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
